executable.title: Markups
executable.description: Create and edit markups, supplementary information associated with a scene. Currently supported markups are lists of fiducial points. Fiducials can be placed using the mouse mode tool bar. Once fiducial place mode has been entered, a new fiducial can be placed under the current mouse position by pressing the p key. Right mouse button click will exit persistent place mode.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

parameter.label: Markups fiducial node selector
parameter.description: Select a Markups fiducial node from the scene to populate the GUI and allow modifications. One option is to create a new node with the display properties of the current list.

parameter.label: Reset to Defaults
parameter.description: Reset the display properties of this markups node to the system defaults.

parameter.label: Save to Defaults
parameter.description: Save the display properties of this markups node to be the new system defaults.

parameter.label: Glyph Type
parameter.description: Select the symbol that will be used to mark each location. Default is the Sphere3D.

parameter.label: Selected Color
parameter.description: Select the color that will be used to display the glyph and text when the markup is marked as selected.

parameter.label: Unselected Color
parameter.description: Select the color that will be used to display the glyph and text when the markup is not marked as selected.

parameter.label: Glyph Scale
parameter.description: Pick the relative size of the glyph used to mark the points.

parameter.label: Text Scale
parameter.description: Pick the relative size of the text shown beside each glyph. Select 0 to turn off text.

parameter.label: Opacity
parameter.description: Pick the opacity used for the glyph and text, select 0 for invisible, 1 for fully visible.

parameter.label: Projection
parameter.description: A widget that controls the projection of the fiducials in the 2D viewers onto slices around the one on which the fiducial has been placed.

parameter.label: 2D Projection
parameter.description: Toggle the eye icon open or closed to enable or disable visualization of projectied fiducial on 2D viewers.

parameter.label: Use Fiducial Color
parameter.description: If checked, color the projections the same color as the fiducials.

parameter.label: Projection Color
parameter.description: If not using fiducial color for the projection, use this color.

parameter.label: Outlined Behind Slice Plane
parameter.description: Fiducial projection is displayed filled (opacity = Projection Opacity) when on top of slice plane, outlined when behind, and with full opacity when in the plane.

parameter.label: Projection Opacity
parameter.description: A value between 0 (invisible) and 1 (fully visible) for displaying the fiducial projection.

parameter.label: Add Markup
parameter.description: Add a new markup to the selected list, placing it at the origin

parameter.label: Visibility
parameter.description: Toggle the list visibility, which will over ride the individual markup visibility settings. If the eye icon is open, the list is visible, and pressing it will make it invisible. If the eye icon is closed, the list is invisilbe and pressing the button will make it visible.

parameter.label: Locked
parameter.description: Toggle the list lock state (if it can be moved by mouse interactions in the viewers), which will over ride the individual markup lock settings. If the lock icon is open, the list is unlocked, and pressing it will lock it. If the lock icon is closed, the list is locked and pressing the button will unlock it. When the list is locked, the table is disabled so no changes can be made to fiducial positions there.

parameter.label: Delete the highlighted markups from the active list
parameter.description: After highlighting rows in the table to select markups, press this button to delete them from the list.

parameter.label: Remove all markups from the active list
parameter.description: Pressing this button will delete all of the markups in the active list, leaving it having a list length of 0

parameter.label: Select All
parameter.description: Select all the markups in the active list.

parameter.label: Deselect All
parameter.description: Deselect all the markups in the active list - they won't be passed to CLIs.

parameter.label: Visibility On
parameter.description: Set visibility flag to on for all markups in active list.

parameter.label: Visibility Off
parameter.description: Set visibility flag to off for all markups in active list.

parameter.label: Lock Off
parameter.description: Set the lock flag to false on all markups in the active list. They will respond to mouse events in the viewers.

parameter.label: Lock On
parameter.description: Set the lock flag to true on all markups in the active list. They will not respond to mouse events in the viewers.

parameter.label: Move Up
parameter.description: Move a highlighted markup up one spot in the list.

parameter.label: Move Down
parameter.description: Move a highlighted markup down one spot in the list.

parameter.label: Click Name to Jump Slices
parameter.description: If checked, click in name column to jump slices to that point. The radio buttons control if the slice is centered on the markup or not after the jump.

parameter.label: Name Format
parameter.description: Format for creating names of new markups, using sprintf format style. %N is replaced by the list name, %d by an integer.

parameter.label: Use List Name
parameter.description: Toggle using the list name as a prefix in the name format.

parameter.label: Reset
parameter.description: Rest the name format field to the default value, %N-%d.

parameter.label: Rename
parameter.description: Rename all markups in this list according to the current name format, trying to preserve numbers. A quick way to renumber all the fiducials according to their index is to use a name format with no number in it, rename, then add the number format specifier %d to the format and rename one more time.

parameter.label: Convert Annotation Fiducials to Markups Fiducial Lists
parameter.description: Uses annotation fiduical hierarchies to make markup lists. Removes the annotations once they've been moved.

parameter.label: Selected
parameter.description: A check box is shown in this column, it's check state depends on if the markup is selected or not. Click to toggle the selected state.

parameter.label: Locked
parameter.description: An open or closed padlock is shown in this column, depending on if the markup is unlocked or locked. Click it to toggle the locked state.

parameter.label: Visibility
parameter.description: An open or closed eye icon is shown in this column, depending on if the markup is visible or not. Click it to toggle the visibility state.

parameter.label: Name
parameter.description: A short name for this markup, displayed in the viewers as text next to the glyphs.

parameter.label: Description
parameter.description: A longer description for this markup, not displayed in the viewers.

parameter.label: X, Y, Z
parameter.description: The RAS coordinates of this markup.
